about.title: About Me
about.content: I'm a passionate frontend developer specializing in Next.js, with a strong foundation in modern web technologies. My journey began with WordPress development from 2018 to 2019, before transitioning to cutting-edge frontend frameworks in 2020. In September 2024, I earned the Meta Frontend Developer Certification, further solidifying my expertise in building dynamic and scalable web applications.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.subtitle: A comprehensive overview of my technical expertise and proficiency levels in various technologies

footer.designed: Designed with passion using Next.js and Tailwind CSS
